param.name: USER
param.label: User
param.description: User name - Can be overriden on a per-user basis.

param.name: PASS
param.label: Password
param.description: User password - Can be overriden on a per-user basis.

param.name: USE_SESSION_CREDENTIALS
param.label: Use session credentials
param.description: Try to use the current AjaXplorer user credentials for connecting
